mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXTENDED_COMMUTE(id, employeeId, workOffTime) VALUES (EXTENDED_COMMUTE_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{employeeId}, ${commuteId}, #{approvalId}, #{workOffTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EXTENDED_COMMUTE JOIN APPROVAL ON EXTENDED_COMMUTE.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE APPROVAL.state = 'SUBMIT' AND TRUNC(workOffTime) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND EXTENDED_COMMUTE.employeeId = #{employeeId}
